text: Futhi labo ababekhonza izithixo bathi, â€œukube uMvelinqangi wayethanda sasingeke sikhonze lutho esikhundleni sakhe thina nabobaba bethu futhi sasingeke sinqabele lutho ngaphandle kwakhe, benza kanjalo labo ababengaphambilini kwabo, ngakube ukhona yini omunye umsebenzi ophezu kwezithunywa ngaphandle kokudlulisa umyalezo ocacile na
